fields.description:
h2. Problem

When closing the application via back button (exitOnClose: true), it seams that the app doesn't exit immediately. It's not appearing in task manager, but if one tries to open it, it crashes. I need to wait about 10-20 sec between two application starts.

h2. Test case

New Mobile Project or KitchenSink

h2. Discussions

[http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/132274/android-application-closing-problem-with-sdk-190-v8]


This issue doesn't exist in "Ti 1.8.2 Feb 2 2012 10:31 rcacde6be" but in "Ti 1.8.2 Feb 14 2012 16:31 r43d708c2".
So, it has to be caused by a change from this merge/commit [https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/43d708c2e6c315ae747fe9e6d9aad2fc070ec120]
fields.summary: Android: App crashes when restarting app soon after closing
fields.environment:
* Titanium SDK version: Titanium 1.8.2 r43d708c2 and later, latest builds from Titanium 1.9.0/2.0.0
* Javascript Engine: V8 
* Platform & version: Android 2.3
* Device Details: Samsung Galaxy S2 
* Host Operating System: OSX 10.7.2
* Titanium Studio version: 1.0.8

comments.body: same issue for me (even with  Titanium SDK version: 2.0.0 02/16/12 18:01 f0ea3e8)

This is fixed and you can get the latest fix from the CI build, going to this page: http://builds.appcelerator.com.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html and selecting the master branch

Best,

Mauro
